pages.title: Welcome to this World
pages.text: Greetings Survivalist and welcome to the most expansive chapter yet of the Survivalist's Field Guide.$(br2)This chapter will inform you all the wonders and dangers, flora and fauna - that you await you out there in this great big world.$(br2)$(l)Good Luck! : )$()
In particular we will cover:$(br)$(li)A 'How-To' on composting$(li)Several Bestiary chapters on creatures inhabiting the world$(br2)and lastly$(br)$(li) Chapters on enemies and travel
